class.name: mysql
class.description: Allows to connect to a MySQL database. Has several ways to fetch data.

method.name: set_credentials
method.description: Stores the connection's credentials of the current MySQL instance. Can be changed any time.

method.name: get_columns_name
method.description: Returns a Array containing only the column names.

method.name: get_column_types
method.description: Returns an array containing only the column types.

method.name: fetch_array
method.description: Returns a two-dimensional array containing the query result. The returned data has the same datatype of the saved data on SQL database.

method.name: fetch_array_string
method.description: Returns a two-dimensional array containing the query result. All the data are returned as Strings.

method.name: fetch_dictinary
method.description: Returns an array of dictionaries containing the query result. Every dictionaries represents a row in the done query. The returned data has the same datatype of the saved data on SQL database.

method.name: fetch_dictinary_string
method.description: Returns an array of dictionaries containing the query result. Every array's element is dictionaries and each of these dictionaries represents a row in the done query. All the data are returned as Strings.
